data.title: Marshall University
data.meta_description: Kendall Gant (14) S - SOPHOMORE SEASON (2015): Played all 13 games, making four starts … Emerged during season as “third safety’ … ...
data.text:
SOPHOMORE SEASON (2015): Played all 13 games, making four starts … Emerged during season as “third safety’ … Rangy player with length performed on special teams … Played in eight of 13 games on defense, other five on special teams … Started and played 48 of 51 defensive snaps in St. Petersburg Bowl win, in which he had second career interception … Played 279 defensive snaps …Made 39 tackles, with one pass breakup … First career interception came in Oct. 3 win over Old Dominion … Made career-high 12 tackles in victory over North Texas … Had nine tackles in bowl win.

FRESHMAN SEASON (2014): One of eight true freshmen to play for the 2014 Herd … A backup safety, played in seven of 14 games, including the Conference USA title game and Boca Raton Bowl victories … Played 52 snaps on defense, 26 of those versus Rhode Island and 20 in win at Akron … Finished with six tackles (five solos), three of those in Week 2 victory over Rhode Island.
